## HTTP request

- rvest 讓我們模仿使用瀏覽器的方式造訪網站，取得表格與表單
- 仍然有使用場景，我們必須親自發出HTTP請求
- 例如API

- Demo site: [SER API](http://api.ser.ideas.iii.org.tw/docs/#!/fb_fanpage_search)

- httr::POST
- httr::GET

```{r}
library(httr)
library(magrittr)
res = httr::GET("http://api.ser.ideas.iii.org.tw:80/api/lbs_restaurant/restaurant_city_search?city=%E5%8F%B0%E5%8C%97%E5%B8%82&type=%E7%95%B0%E5%9C%8B%E6%96%99%E7%90%86&sort=score&token=api_doc_token")
res %>% content() %>% str()
```

深入了解HTTP協定URLs、Verbs、Status Codes、Request and Response Message Formats
